name: Id
description: The unique identifier for the site.

name: Domain
description: URL of public facing site, typically second, third, or fourth level domain.

name: Parent Domain
description: URL of the second-level domain for the domain.

name: Agency Branch
description: The branch of government to which the site belongs.

name: Office
description: Primary office that manages the site, typically the service or staff office (SSO) (one-letter office).

name: Sub-office
description: Sub-office that owns the site, typically a two-letter office or deeper.

name: Contact Email
description: Email address of site contact (person or team) who manages the technical components of the website. This contact does not necessarily control website content or resourcing.

name: Website Manager Email
description: Email address of site business owner. This must be a (1) person not a team and (2) a federal employee (not a contractor).

name: Status
description: The current status of the website in its lifecycle.

name: Type of Site
description: The primary category or function of the site

name: Digital Brand Category
description: The affiliation the site has to GSA and its business offerings; determines the Office of Strategic Communication's (OSC) branding requirements a site must follow.

name: Redirects to
description: Provides the URL that a site URL redirects to, if applicable.

name: Content Management Platform
description: The system/platform the site uses to manage its content

name: Required by Law or Policy
description: Explanation of statutory requirements supporting creation of the site

name: Has DAP?
description: States whether or not the site is running the Digital Analytics Program (DAP) code (Google Analytics)

name: DAP GTM Code
description: The DAP Google Tag Manager (GTM) Code is a unique Id for a website's analytics. A Google tag enables Google Analytics to access usage stats on a website.

name: DAP Parameters
description: Provides the agency and subagency that are reported from the site's Digital Analytics Program (DAP) script.

name: Analytics URL
description: The URL of the site's analytics dashboard.

name: Customer Feedback Tool
description: The tool or mechanism the site uses to solicit user feedback.

name: Sitemap URL
description: The URL of the site's sitemap, which provides information about the site's pages and content files and the relationships between them.

name: Robots TXT URL
description: The URL of the site's robots.txt file

name: Mobile Friendly
description: States whether the site is optimized for use on mobile devices.

name: Has Search?
description: States whether the site has a search feature.

name: Uses Tracking Cookies?
description: States whether the site uses cookies to track users.

name: Authentication Tool
description: The type of tool or mechanism by which the site authenticates its users.

name: Notes
description: Additional comments about the site.

name: Last Updated At
description: Date and time the the site was last edited in Touchpoints.

name: Repository URL
description: The URL of the site's source code repository (typically a GitHub URL)

name: Hosting Platform
description: The platform or service provider the site uses for its web hosting.

name: USWDS Version
description: The release version of the US Web Design System that the site uses.

name: Uses https?
description: States whether the site uses https encryption.

name: Tags
description: Searchable tags to identify various attributes of the site (e.g. 'candidate for decommission').

name: Latest Version
description: The current stable release version of the US Web Design Service code.

name: Third Party Domains
description: A list of novel third party domains detected
